
```{r}
ggplot(data = Game.Census.Climate.Data, aes(x = Steamowners, y = laborpop)) + geom_col(aes(fill = region), position = "dodge")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = Game.Census.Climate.Data, aes(totalprecip, avgtemp)) + geom_line(aes(color=region))
```


